meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Faber Gerry Shefler David Shear Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #537.

td.p: Steve Faber, a mail order executive from Los Angeles, California
Gerry Shefler, a tax preparer from Gibsonia, Pennsylvania
David Shear, a copy editor from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,801)

tr.td: AFRICAN ANIMALS
FAMOUS QUOTES
OLD WEST
WEATHER
(Alex: A name that's very much been in the news the past year...)
IMELDA MARCOS
(Alex: And finally, this is probably in tribute to our own show...)
WE'RE #2
